cause.description:
This I hope makes people realize that even the best sports players support a disease (Curt Shilling) hes been more than a help making more people aware of what ALS is. Support us please, people are dying because of this, deadly disease. show love, even if you think going this group wont help. your wrong.
1. Up to one in 10 cases of ALS appear to be inherited
2. More than 90 percent of cases of ALS appear to occur randomly, with no identifiable cause and no obvious risk factors.
3. a small percentage of people who have ALS inherit it. Inherited ALS may strike at a younger age and will affect consecutive generations
cause.mission: donate money and help those that struggle with ALS & those who had love ones diagnosed with this illness
cause.name: ALS (Lou Gherigs disease)
